name: Dewpider

evolution.description: Dewpider can evolve into Araquanid at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Water Bubble Pokémon. When two Dewpider meet, they display their water bubbles to each other. Then the one with the smaller bubble gets out of the other’s way.

abilities.name: Water Bubble
abilities.description: This Pokémon is resistant to fire-type damage and immune to the burned condition.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.
